name: 9Grids VR
description: 9 Grids VR is an arcade-style, fast-paced, short and easy fun game for the HTC Vive that is a combination of whack a mole and dodgeball in a apocalyptic world. Slash or blast up your enemies and dodge their attacks by moving physically around the unique 9 Grids movement system!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7,8 or 10 (64bit) Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 equivalent or greater Storage: 4 GB available space
